args: Seriously! That was some of the best\nfish I've ever had.
Well, we are by the sea. Food does tend\nto taste best when it's fresh.
So, now that we're fed, what shall we\ndo next?
Why don't we get in the water?\nIt's not often we have the chance.
So long as you don't expect me to match\nthe energy Luca and Ranzal displayed\nearlier, I'm not opposed.
Ha ha, not at all. I was kind of just hoping\nto splash around in the shallows.
Careful not to slip.\nMmm... The water feels\nquite nice on my feet.
I should be all right wading to my waist...
Surprised by a wave, of all things...\nI apologize for any worry I caused.
Still, I suppose moments like this are part\nof what makes the sea such an enjoyable\ndestination.
Sure, as long as nobody gets hurt...\nWait, where's your other accessory?
Hm? You're right. That wave must have\ncarried it away.
Oh well, there's no getting it back now.
I'm going to go look for it.\nIt might still be nearby.
Wait, underwater?!\nPlease, it's not worth it!
It's all right, {player_name}.\nWhat's done is done.
I can't give up yet. It may have washed\nup on the shore somewhere.
You've been searching for hours to no\navail. It's clearly been lost to the sea.
So please, just let it go.
Please, let me keep searching.\nJust a bit longer.
Why are you so desperate to find it?
You made those accessories especially for\ntoday, right?
I happened to pass your room while\nyou were making them.
You were so focused, you didn't notice me.
So knowing how much work and care you\nput in, I can't just accept that it's gone.
So that is what's behind this...
I know I can find it—I just have to\nkeep looking.
I shall say it again: You really are too\nkind for your own good.
And stubborn to a fault, as well.
...Still, I'm your retainer, and your friend.
If you're refusing to give up,\nI can't stop trying either.
So I, too, shall search a while longer.
Ah! Where did you find it?!
It was drifting this way on the waves.\nI'm so glad we found it!
And just as we steeled our resolve,\nno less. What a curious coincidence.
Here. I think the other one was lonely.
Indeed. I did feel somehow...off with only\none of the pair.
It's so bright all of a sudden...\n{player_name}, look at the water!
Wow... What a beautiful sunset.\nIt's almost like the sun is sinking.
I was so focused on searching, I had no\nidea it was already so low.
Nor did I. It's almost as if the sky has\nbeen streaked with watercolors.
Sunsets here look quite different than\nthey do in the Mistholt.
Yeah. It's one of the most dazzling lights\nI've ever seen.
Heh. That reminds me of a\ncertain someone.

Who indeed? At the very least,
we certainly wouldn't want that
person to disappear like the sun
does each day.
In any event, it was merely a\npassing comment.
You realize you're only making me\nmore curious, right?
Truly, though, I want to thank you.\nI never expected you would spend so\nmuch time searching on my behalf.
It's the least I could do for a friend.
We should probably head back, though.\nIt's going to be dark soon.
Yes. Let us return to the others.
...We won't let you disappear.\nNot so long as we fight alongside you.
Your light is our source of hope.
